name: Tattered Paper (Alphonso)
desc: A tattered piece of paper left by someone. It seems to be torn from some sheet music and has become rather brittle with the passing of years.

value.text:
Aranyaka: Woodland Encounter
Obtained from Alphonso

desc.text:
<color=#ffffff>...</color>
<color=#ffffff>We are children with no kin, the petty servants on whom no light shines.</color>
<color=#ffffff>In our left hand is the shield that protects our home, and our right wields the sword that is the will of the polar star.</color>
<color=#ffffff>For crowns we wear masks that deplore the twisted logic of the heavens, and false gods and vanquished foes lie at our feet.</color>
<color=#ffffff>...</color>
<color=#ffffff>Let me be the evil amidst good, the poison amidst the herbs, the wolf in sheep's clothing, the mercury in a golden chalice,</color>
<color=#ffffff>I shall leave my siblings beyond blood, and fight for parents whose blood I do not share.</color>
<color=#ffffff>My dear Snezheviches, my dear Snezhevnas, my brothers and sisters,</color>
<color=#ffffff>If I were to one day cease my journey and slumber under the white birch, please carry on without me...</color>
